sentences.en: A lot of Latin-American officials are stressing the symbolic importance of the trip.
sentences.cn: 许多拉丁美洲的官员都在强调此行的重要象征意义。

sentences.en: Addresses in the source program are generally symbolic ( such as count ).
sentences.cn: 源程序中的地址通常来说是静态的,比如计数器.

sentences.en: Each element of the ceremony has a symbolic meaning .
sentences.cn: 仪式的每一个元素都具有象征意义。

sentences.en: In LEVEL 5, the term for referring to symbolic attributes.
sentences.cn: 在LEVEL5中, 指符号型属性的术语.

sentences.en: It is symbolic of the fighting spirit of modern womanhood.
sentences.cn: 它象征着现代妇女的战斗精神.

sentences.en: People threw flowers into the river between the two countries as a symbolic act of brotherhood.
sentences.cn: 人们把鲜花投进两国的界河里，以象征两国人民的兄弟情谊常在。

sentences.en: The British Expeditionary Force was no more than a symbolic contribution.
sentences.cn: 英国远征军不过是一种象征性的支援.

sentences.en: The Christian ceremony of baptism is a symbolic act.
sentences.cn: 基督教的洗礼仪式是一种象征性的做法.

sentences.en: The cross is symbolic of Christianity.
sentences.cn: 十字架是基督教的象徵.

sentences.en: The dove is symbolic of peace.
The gestures are highly stylized and symbolic.
sentences.cn: 各种姿势都是高度程式化的,并且具有高度象征意义.

sentences.en: The move today was largely symbolic.
sentences.cn: 今天的举动在很大程度上只是象征性的。

sentences.en: The President's visit is loaded with symbolic significance.
sentences.cn: 总统之行充满象征性意义。

sentences.en: They came to venerate him as a symbolic figure.
sentences.cn: 他们把他当作偶像来崇拜.

sentences.en: This is perhaps most obvious in the symbolic turns of the Presidency.
sentences.cn: 这可能在具有象征意义的总统的更换中看得最明显了.

sentences.en: Yellow clothes are worn as symbolic of spring.
sentences.cn: 穿上黄色的衣服象征着春天来了。

words.tran_cn: 象征，象征主义；符号论；记号
象征主义者；符号学者；记号使用者
象征；符号表现；象征作用
符号学，符号使用；象征学，象征的使用
用符号表示，使用符号（等于symbolize）
采用象征；使用符号；作为…的象征
象征的；符号的；使用符号的

phrases.tran_cn: 符号语言；象征性的语言
符号逻辑；数理逻辑；符号论理学
符号表示；符号表征；符号性表象

trans.tran_en: a symbolic action is important because of what it represents but may not have any real effect
